Install
```````


.. code:: bash

    `[sudo] pip install rreplace`

Usage
`````


.. code:: python

    >>> from rreplace import rreplace
    
    >>> rreplace(string,old,new,count=None)


Examples
````````


.. code:: python

    >>> rreplace('old_old','old','new',1))
    'old_new'
